overview: Vekkula The Movie is Mika Koivusalo’s documentary of Vekkula, the legendary funhouse of the Linnanmäki amusement park in Helsinki. The movie is a nostalgy-filled audiovisual journey into this house of surprises, its history and the history of Linnanmäki in general. The film contains plenty of archival footage of Vekkula and Linnanmäki.
title: Vekkula The Movie
